title: Black Ties and Lullabies
description: A good girl can be bad for one night...Bernadette Hogan doesn't make mistakes. Not when it comes to caring for her mother, and not at her job protecting Texas's most eligible--and infuriating--bachelor. Maybe that's why she's overcome with guilt after one tiny a passionate fling with her boss that's left her confused, intrigued...and pregnant.But can a bad boy be good for a lifetime?To self-made millionaire Jeremy Bridges, women are like fine if held for too long, they sour. But one wild night with Bernadette changed all that. She makes him laugh, she makes him think, and soon she's going to make him a father. For the first time, Jeremy wants to be a one-woman man. So how can he convince the fiercely independent Bernadette he's ready to change from partying playboy to dependable dad--and become the loving husband she deserves?
author: Jane Graves
